chefs.name: Chef John Smith
chefs.bio: This Person is a master of fusion cuisine, blending flavors and techniques from around the world to create unique, unforgettable dishes. With over years of experience in the kitchen, David has earned a reputation for his creativity and .

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.cooking_method: Sear beef, sauté mushrooms and onions, simmer in a sour cream sauce and serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.name: Garlic Shrimp Scampi
recipes.cooking_method: Sauté shrimp and garlic in butter, toss with cooked linguine and lemon juice.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken in lime juice, sauté with bell peppers and onions, serve in tortillas.

recipes.name: Classic Lasagna
recipes.cooking_method: Layer cooked lasagna noodles with a tomato sauce and a mixture of ground beef, ricotta and mozzarella cheeses.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
recipes.cooking_method: Season salmon with butter, garlic, and dill, and bake in the oven until cooked through.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
recipes.cooking_method: Brown beef and garlic. Layer with cooked noodles, tomato sauce, and cheese. Bake until cheese is melted.
